title: Segunda muerte
overview: 'Segunda Muerte' is a thriller starring a police assistant, whose father is a recently retired UCO legend, who finds herself involved in a criminal investigation in a quiet Pasiego town.In a small town in Cantabria, a young auxiliary police officer finds the body of an elderly lady who has recently passed away. The mystery lies in the fact that it is the body of Juliana Cobi√°n, who had passed away seven years ago. Who was buried in her place, then? When Juliana's coffin is exhumed, another woman's body is found inside: it is Soledad's, Juliana's daughter that, according to all the neighbours, had left the town twenty years before. What lies behind this second death?
